doc:
Jordan Christopher https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jordan_Christopher 0 Jordan Christopher (October 23, 1940 – January 21, 1996) was an American actor and singer. He was the lead singer of The Wild Ones, who recorded the original version of the rock classic "Wild Thing" after Christopher had left the band. Jordan_Christopher ( October_23_,_1940 – January_21_,_1996 ) was an_American_actor_and_singer . He was the_lead_singer of The_Wild_Ones , who recorded the_original_version of the_rock_classic_"_Wild_Thing " after Christopher had_left the_band .
